languages.text: "Превосходно! Я немедля созову двор для финального торжества лицемерия! И, кто знает, быть может, сегодня одному из слуг повезет заслужить вашу милость".

traits.locale_text: "Превосходно! Я немедля созову двор для финального торжества лицемерия! И, кто знает, быть может, сегодня одному из слуг повезет заслужить вашу милость".

languages.text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."
languages.original_text: "Превосходно! Я немедля созову двор для финального торжества лицемерия! И, кто знает, быть может, сегодня одному из слуг повезет заслужить вашу милость".

traits.locale_text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows, perhaps today one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."
"Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows, perhaps today one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."
"Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."
"Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."
"Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."
"Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."

languages.text: “太棒了！我准备立刻召集宫廷成员，举行这场盛典最后的庆祝活动！谁知道呢，说不定哪个冒牌货走了大运，能得到您的青睐呢。”
languages.original_text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."

traits.locale_text: “太棒了！我准备立刻召集宫廷成员，举行这场盛典最后的庆祝活动！谁知道呢，说不定哪个冒牌货走了大运，能得到您的青睐呢。”

languages.text: «¡Espléndido! ¡Convocaré inmediatamente a la corte para una última celebración de la hipocresía! Y quién sabe: tal vez algún día uno de los impostores tenga la buena fortuna de ganarse su favor».
languages.original_text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."

traits.locale_text: «¡Espléndido! ¡Convocaré inmediatamente a la corte para una última celebración de la hipocresía! Y quién sabe: tal vez algún día uno de los impostores tenga la buena fortuna de ganarse su favor».

languages.text: "Harika! İkiyüzlülüğün nihayete kavuşmasını son bir kez daha kutlamak için derhâl saraylıları toplayacağım! Belki bugün taklitçilerden biri lütfunuza nail olur, kim bilir..."
languages.original_text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."

traits.locale_text: "Harika! İkiyüzlülüğün nihayete kavuşmasını son bir kez daha kutlamak için derhâl saraylıları toplayacağım! Belki bugün taklitçilerden biri lütfunuza nail olur, kim bilir..."

languages.text: 「素晴らしい！すぐに宮廷を呼び寄せて、偽善行為の最後のお祝いを催します！さぁ、どうでしょうか。もしかしたら、今日、偽者の中の一人があなたの気に入るような幸運を持っているかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい！すぐに宮廷を呼び寄せて、偽善行為の最後のお祝いを催します！さぁ、どうでしょうか。もしかしたら、今日、偽者の中の一人があなたの気に入るような幸運を持っているかもしれません」

languages.text: « Excellent ! Je m'en vais de ce pas convoquer la cour pour une dernière célébration de l'hypocrisie ! Qui sait, l'un des imposteurs aura peut-être la chance de gagner vos faveurs aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."

traits.locale_text: « Excellent ! Je m'en vais de ce pas convoquer la cour pour une dernière célébration de l'hypocrisie ! Qui sait, l'un des imposteurs aura peut-être la chance de gagner vos faveurs aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Köstlich! Ich rufe augenblicklich den Hof zusammen, um ein letztes Mal die Heuchelei zu feiern! Und wer weiß, vielleicht hat ja heute einer der Hochstapler das Glück, Eure Gunst zu gewinnen."
languages.original_text: "Delightful! I will immediately summon the court for a final celebration of hypocrisy! And who knows: perhaps, today, one of the impostors will be lucky enough to earn your favour."

traits.locale_text: "Köstlich! Ich rufe augenblicklich den Hof zusammen, um ein letztes Mal die Heuchelei zu feiern! Und wer weiß, vielleicht hat ja heute einer der Hochstapler das Glück, Eure Gunst zu gewinnen."
